long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a choose-your-own-adventure game! It's a text-based game based on old Choose-Your-Own-Adventure books and lets you pick an exciting path through a rich and compelling story about a dreamy haunt! New stories will be added in forthcoming versions to keep things fresh. The stories are bundled in the extension and don't require a connection or account to any other website.

As an extra bonus, and for a programming exercise for myself, it also includes a random insult generator to help give your friends a hard time in a playful and creative way! :)
